name: The Galactic Colosseum
description:
This game was made for Beginners Circle Jam #4 

You have been captured by aliens to participate in their game show, "The galctic colosseum".  Fight your way to victory and save earth! 

Music from https://opengameart.org/content/prologue and https://opengameart.org/content/space-dimensions-8bitretro-version
